00018 /*
00019  * Model_Builder.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *
00023  *
00024  *
00025  *  Created on: 11-May-2010
00026  *

00028 
00029 #ifndef MODELBUILDER_H_
00030 #define MODELBUILDER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "Model_Refiner.h"
00033 #include "Pipeline.h"
00034 #include "Execution_Strategy.h"
00035 #include "Model.h"
00036 
00037 //!The builder class which builds the different components
00038 //!needed to create the model.
00039 /**
00040  * We use the Builder pattern.
00041  *
00042  * The components are:
00043  * 1. Model_Refiner: This main component that describes how
00044  *                   the model should be refined as documents
00045  *                   pass through the pipeline
00046  * 2. Pipeline: A pipeline of filters that perform the various
00047  *              refinements defined by the refiner
00048  * 3. Execution_Strategy: A strategy that defines how the pipeline
00049  *                        of filters has to be executed
00050  *
00051  * Usually, different modes demand different builders and similar
00052  * or different components. So keep in mind that inheritance can
00053  * be used here to maximize code reuse
00054  */
00055 class Model_Builder {
00056 
00057 public:
00058     virtual Model_Refiner& create_model_refiner() = 0;
00059     virtual Pipeline& create_pipeline(Model_Refiner&) = 0;
00060     virtual Execution_Strategy& create_execution_strategy(Pipeline&) = 0;
00061     virtual void create_output() = 0;
00062 
00063     virtual Model& get_model() = 0;
00064 };
00065 
00066 #endif /* MODELBUILDER_H_ */
